title: Future Aesthetics of the Gateway
subTitle: 國門之都的未來美學：青埔現代藝術與水族奇觀
intro: Designed for layover travelers and modern art lovers. Explore the calligraphy art museum and the urban aquarium right next to the HSR station.

spots.name: Hengshan Calligraphy Art Center (橫山書法藝術館)
spots.description: Situated by a pond, the architecture resembles an inkstone. A serene place combining traditional calligraphy with modern design.

spots.name: Gloria Outlets (華泰名品城)
spots.description: An open-air American style outlet mall. Perfect for lunch and shopping for international brands at discounted prices.

spots.name: Xpark Aquarium (Xpark 都會型水族館)
spots.description: A collaborative project with Yokohama Hakkeijima. Don't miss the kaleidoscopic jellyfish zone and the penguin café.

title: Baroque Time Travel
subTitle: 穿越百年的巴洛克時光：大溪老街文化巡禮
intro: Visit Daxi, once a bustling river port. Admire the Baroque facades of the old street and taste the famous dried tofu.
transportation: **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle 501 (Daxi Express)** from HSR Taoyuan Station.

spots.name: Daxi Old Street (大溪老街)
spots.description: Walk along Heping Road to see the intricate stone carvings of mythical beasts on the Baroque facades.

spots.name: Old Abe Dried Tofu (老阿伯現滷豆干)
spots.description: Challenge your taste buds with the 'Full Set' of braised tofu products, served with a signature garlic sauce.

spots.name: Cihu Sculpture Park (慈湖雕塑公園)
spots.description: A surreal park gathering hundreds of statues of Chiang Kai-shek, reflecting Taiwan's transitional justice history.

title: Urban Wild & Nightlife
subTitle: 都會野性與跨國界夜生活：青埔x中壢不夜城
intro: Experience the contrast between the polished Qingpu and the raw energy of Zhongli. Enjoy expat bars and Southeast Asian cuisine.

spots.name: Zhongli Night Market (中壢觀光夜市)
spots.description: A bustling night market. Must-try: Jian's Spicy Stinky Tofu and Ribao Scallion Pancake.

spots.name: Zhongli Southeast Asian District (中壢火車站前)
spots.description: Explore the vibrant area filled with Vietnamese, Indonesian, and Thai shops. A testament to Taiwan's multicultural society.

spots.name: Matsu New Village (馬祖新村眷村文創園區)
spots.description: A preserved military dependents' village. Wander through the retro houses and visit local craft shops.

title: Forest & Tea Aroma
subTitle: 山林與茶香的療癒之旅：大溪x小烏來
intro: Dive into the history of Taiwan's 'Tea Gold' era and challenge your courage on the transparent skywalk over a waterfall.

spots.name: Daxi Tea Factory (大溪老茶廠)
spots.description: A fusion of Japanese and English architecture. Learn about the tea-making process and enjoy organic black tea in a vintage setting.

spots.name: Xiao Wulai Skywalk (小烏來天空步道)
spots.description: Stand on a glass platform 70 meters above the waterfall bottom. A thrilling experience surrounded by lush forests.

title: Ancient Trees & Peaches
subTitle: 北橫神木與雲端上的水蜜桃：拉拉山深呼吸
intro: A journey deep into the Central Mountain Range. Walk among millennial red cypress trees and taste the famous Lalashan peaches (seasonal).

spots.name: Lalashan Giant Tree Trail (拉拉山巨木群步道)
spots.description: Home to 24 giant red cypress trees, some over 2000 years old. The trail is cool and refreshing, perfect for forest bathing.

spots.name: Upper Baling (上巴陵)
spots.description: Stay in a homestay with a view. On clear nights, enjoy stargazing; in the morning, wake up to a sea of clouds.

title: Taoyuan Panorama
subTitle: 桃園全景：時光旅人的足跡
intro: From the futuristic Qingpu to the historic Daxi and the grassroots Zhongli. A complete spectrum of Taoyuan's personality.

spots.name: COZZI Blu (和逸飯店)
spots.description: An ocean-themed hotel near Xpark. Offers a unique staycation experience with a 24-hour aquarium channel in the room.

spots.name: Daxi Wood Art Ecomuseum (木藝生態博物館)
spots.description: A museum without walls. Explore various historical buildings scattered throughout Daxi, including the Butokuden (Martial Arts Hall).

spots.name: Chen Qiugang Shaved Ice (陳秋剛綿綿冰)
spots.description: A hidden gem in Guishan. Famous for its natural fruit flavors like Dragon Fruit and Passion Fruit. A refreshing end to the trip.
